title: Villainous
overview: Villainous is a Mexican cartoon that aired 10 short episodes in 2017, primarily for the "Cartoon Network Everything" app, with more likely coming in the future. The show follows Black Hat, his scientist Dr. Flug, his biggest fan Demencia, and a failed experiment named 5.0.5. as he attempts to develop evil products to sell to other villains through the Black Hat Organization.
